title: Krebs & Calvin Cycle Comparison, 5 answer options

content.question: Which of the following statements is true about the Krebs (citric acid) cycle and the Calvin (light-independent) cycle?

choices.label: They both result in a net production of ATP and NADH.
They both require a net input of ATP.
They both result in a release of oxygen.
They both take place within the cytoplasmic matrix.
They both are carried out by enzymes located within an organelle matrix.

content.answer: They both are carried out by enzymes located within an organelle matrix.
